BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sqlserver.visitor.statement.impl.SQLServerDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitAlterTable(SQLServerStatementParser$AlterTableContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sqlserver.visitor.statement.impl.SQLServerDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitCreateTableClause(SQLServerStatementParser$CreateTableClauseContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sqlserver.visitor.statement.impl.SQLServerStatementSQLVisitor.visitCastFunction(SQLServerStatementParser$CastFunctionContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sqlserver.visitor.statement.impl.SQLServerStatementSQLVisitor.visitOrderBy(SQLServerSelectStatement, SQLServerStatementParser$OrderByClauseContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sqlserver.visitor.statement.impl.SQLServerStatementSQLVisitor.visitOrderBy(SQLServerSelectStatement, SQLServerStatementParser$OrderByClauseContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sqlserver.visitor.statement.impl.SQLServerStatementSQLVisitor.visitTableReference(SQLServerStatementParser$TableReferenceContext) stores return result in local before immediately returning it
